body:
Administrator of `lastz` said that `ch` needs to be declared as type int in the function.
so I declared `ch` as type int in the function.

This fix will be reflected the next release. I added version "1.04.03" in the recipe and applied a patch up to version "1.04.03".

Ref: https://github.com/lastz/lastz/commit/20aa14f483265b4eac97f25aca666c708b9655e4
title: lastz: declare ch as type int and add version 1.04.03
